name: Dies irae ~Interview with Kaziklu Bey~
description: The world of Dies irae returns with an all-new side story based around LDO member Wilhelm Ehrenburg. The subject of an interview in a dusty bar, the legendary "Kaziklu Bey" recounts the tale of a conflict he suffered long in the past...
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: highcolor(16bit),VRAM256MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 3.0 GHz (4core) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: fullcolor(32bit),VRAM512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound
